item.description: Bitcoin (BTC) rebounded sharply on Tuesday, climbing 3.86% to reclaim the $105,000 mark after dipping to $98,000 over the weekend. item.description:
Crypto price prediction today has reported a 2 % upturn in the $3.37 tn crypto market following the Israel–Iran ceasefire, detailing breakouts in meme leaders Shiba Inu, Toncoin and Pepe and spotlighting Solana-based Snorter’s fixed-price presale as investors search for the next rally catalyst.

item.description:

item.title: BTC Soars Within 5% of ATH as Returns Amplifier BTC Bull Token Presale Enters Final 6 Days
item.description:
Bitcoin has regained momentum, rising above $105,000 after an Iran-Israel ceasefire and sitting within 5 % of its record high. Simultaneously, the BTC Bull Token presale has entered its last six days, promising proportional Bitcoin rewards for holders whenever BTC crosses designated price milestones.

item.description:
ChatGPT has integrated 42 live technical, on-chain, regulatory, and sentiment metrics to map XRP’s 90-day prospects. The token trades at $2 with RSI 34 and resistance near the 200-day EMA. Analysts assign 95 % odds to a U.S. spot ETF, and lawsuit settlement progress has eased risk.

item.title: Crypto Is Not A Partisan Issue, Crypto Exec Ryan VanGrack Testifies
item.description:
Ryan VanGrack has appeared before the Senate Banking Committee, arguing crypto regulation must stay non-partisan. He said the lack of a national framework has driven opportunity offshore and urged swift, comprehensive rules to safeguard consumers and support domestic innovation.

 

The post Crypto Is Not A Partisan Issue, Crypto Exec Ryan VanGrack Testifies appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Chainlink Made a Historic Partnership with Mastercard to Let 3B+ Cardholders Buy Crypto On-chain
item.description:
Chainlink has announced a partnership with Mastercard that lets 3 billion cardholders buy crypto onchain in a single step through Swapper Finance, combining Mastercard’s network with ZeroHash custody, Shift4 card processing and XSwap liquidity, helping lower barriers for mainstream adoption.

The post Chainlink Made a Historic Partnership with Mastercard to Let 3B+ Cardholders Buy Crypto On-chain appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Senate GOP Unveils Bold Crypto Market Structure Principles – Here’s What Could Change
item.description:
Senate Republicans, led by Tim Scott, Thom Tillis, Bill Hagerty and Cynthia Lummis, have released plans to separate crypto securities from commodities, endorse shared oversight and targeted AML rules, marking the chamber’s readiness for negotiations with the House on market structure legislation.

The post Senate GOP Unveils Bold Crypto Market Structure Principles – Here’s What Could Change appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: DeFi Dev Corp Launches Dogwifhat Validator: Staking Rewards Split with Community – Here’s How
item.description:
DeFi Dev Corp has partnered with the Dogwifhat community to run a Solana validator, handling technical upkeep and dividing staking income equally. The move complements its wider plan to grow SOL backing per share, tokenise its stock via xStocks, and pursue onchain capital despite recent SEC hurdles.

The post DeFi Dev Corp Launches Dogwifhat Validator: Staking Rewards Split with Community – Here’s How appeared first on Cryptonews.
